sentences.sContent: He occupies the house without paying any rent.
sentences.sCn: 他住在这幢房子里，没有付一分钱房租。

sentences.sContent: The building was purchased and occupied by its new owners last year.
sentences.sCn: 这幢房屋去年被新业主买下入住了。

sentences.sContent: Family photos occupied almost the entire wall.
sentences.sCn: 家人的照片差不多占了整个墙面。

sentences.sContent: Students occupied Sofia University on Monday.
sentences.sCn: 星期一学生们占领了索非亚大学。

words.tran: 已占用的；使用中的；无空闲的

remMethod.val: 占领(occupy)的现象发生(occur)了； oc ＋ cupy(看作copy， 复印) → 复印一份据为己有 → 占有

trans.tranOther: to live or stay in a place
